description: T1 - Sweet Chestnut (TPO 268, T8) - Removal of new branches growing from the base of the tree and any new branches protruding anything up to 3 metres from the base of the tree. Trimming 50cm from low bearing branches.
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
decision_conditions: The Tree Works that are carried shall not exceed the description of the Tree Works amounts as described in Section 7 of the Application Form that was submitted to the Council. Reason: To ensure the preservation of the amenity value and health of the tree(s).

All tree works will be carried out in accordance with British Standard 3998: 2010 Tree work. Recommendations. In order to carry out the tree works to BS 3998:2010 there will be only the removal of secondary and tertiary branches, no primary branches. All finalpruning cuts on the branches will not exceed a third of the diameter of the main stem of the tree when measured at 1.5 meters above ground level. Reason: To ensure that the works are carried out in accordance with good arboricultural practice.

This decision notice for Tree Works is only valid for 2 years from the date of this decision or until the work is completed, whichever is the sooner. Reason: In order to ensure that the work is carried out whilst still appropriate and in accordance with the time period within the legislation and regulations.
